name: TokTikMode
description: "Vertical" mode for Geometry Dash. Best on Android.

compatibilityMode.name: Compatibility Mode
compatibilityMode.description:
If a level has rotation or scale triggers, this mod will not do anything.

<cy>Apparently, the screen needs to be at *exactly* 1.000 scale to have rotation and scale triggers working properly.</c>
<cr>ONLY DISABLE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING.</c>

interactiveFooter.name: Interactive Footer
interactiveFooter.description:
Turns the footer of the TokTik UI into a clickable menu.

<cy>Some menus that appear from pressing these buttons may break. This is a Cocos2d-x issue.</c>

rotationDegrees.name: Rotation (Degrees)
rotationDegrees.description:
The number of degrees you want to rotate your gameplay screen to.

<cy>To disable, set this setting to "0".</c>

<cy>Otherwise, choose either</c> <cl>"90"</c> <cy>or</c> <cl>"270"</c> <cy>degrees.</c>

footerOffset.name: Offset (Lower Menu)
footerOffset.description:
The number of Cocos2d-x units you want to move the TokTik UI's lower menu.

<cy>Positive numbers will bring the lower menu closer to the center of the screen.</c>
<cy>Negative numbers will bring the lower menu further away from the center of the screen.</c>

headerOffset.name: Offset (Upper Menu)
headerOffset.description:
The number of Cocos2d-x units you want to move the TokTik UI's upper menu.

<cy>Negative numbers will bring the upper menu closer to the center of the screen.</c>
<cy>Positive numbers will bring the upper menu further away from the center of the screen.</c>

headerScale.name: Scale (Upper Menu)
headerScale.description: The extent to which you want to scale the TokTik UI's upper menu.

actionsScale.name: Scale (Actions Menu)
actionsScale.description: The extent to which you want to scale the TokTik UI's actions menu (on the right).
